description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It includes a template with dynamic content based on component state, manages internal state for 'favorited' status, and handles user input to toggle this state.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a customizable button that toggles its favorite state.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines the internal state properties for the component, including 'isFavorited', 'favoriteText', and 'unfavoriteText'.
